metadata.name: Glomper #1
metadata.description:
In an attempt to maintain the Candy Hunter way of life, Professor Fizzpop built a portal in search of help from outside sources, what he found would change the landscape of Sweetopia forever.
        
Meet the Glompers of Sweetopia, a collection of 50 unique species summoned from across the planet to help the Candy Hunters discover the secrets that lay beneath their land.
        
Each Candy Hunter NFT is eligible to claim one Glomper during the limited mint window, Candy Hunters can be found here - https://opensea.io/collection/candy-hunters
